senses.sense_definition: A possible event or outcome, especially one that may happen in the future and requires preparation.

examples.text: We must have a backup plan ready for every <w>eventuality</w>.
The insurance policy covers the <w>eventuality</w> of accidental damage to the property.

senses.sense_definition: An individual's natural tendency to notice and observe events, changes, or facts.

examples.text: The psychologist noted the subject's high <w>eventuality</w> regarding their surroundings.
Her <w>eventuality</w> allowed her to perceive subtle shifts in the social atmosphere.
